model.rooms

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.rooms.Room
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntranceRoom, ExitRoom, NormalRoom, TrapRoom, TreasureRoom

    public abstract class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    EntranceRoom is a subclass of an Room used that represent an entrance
    Author:
    Aylin G., Amelie M., Sofian C., Laurent T.
